channel.title: 317 PI Quest interface
channel.description:
More than likely no one wants to spoonfeed me but, I generally want a command like ::commands that will come up with a 'quest' interface and a list of commands. If anyone has it then please share.
Thanks.

item.title: 317 PI Quest interface
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:4, topic:410137”] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Commands.",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126(" ",8156); }[/quote]
Thanks for this mate

item.title: 317 PI Quest interface

item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

escalation:

Find a code that opens the same interface and copy and paste it. Change the command name to “commands” and change the text to your commands…

I don’t believe my source uses it anywhere.
